UpdateLog.description:
<title>Recent News</title><font>Small</font> The mod is officially released for testing. Visit the discord server for more information. <title>Bug Fixes</title><font>Small</font> - Fixed issue with DynamicDrawnWorldObjects on the world map where the mod setting wasn't properly applied
- Fixed bug where air defenses were still drawing their perimeter radius despite being disabled.
- Fixed compatibility issue with XmlExtensions, which would cause a fatal error and CTD.
- Fixed bug where changing a vehicle's movement permissions would not update cached moveable defs, requiring a restart.
- Fixed bug where vehicle's info card would throw exception upon closing.
- Fixed CTD compatibility issue with XmlExtensions and Hugslib.
- Fixed bug where CutoutComplex and Cutout would not properly apply vanilla mask with vehicles.
- Fixed bug where damaging a vehicle would trigger the DraftOn/DraftOff events.
- Fixed bug where pawn would go to (0, 0) on the map while repairing vehicle.
- Fixed bug where pawn would go to (0, 0) when given a prioritized vehicle job.
- Fixed bug where vehicle pathgrid would not update when some Things were destroyed.
- Fixed bug where vehicle turrets would take too much ammo or not refund enough ammo when configured w/ chargePerAmmoCount.
- Fixed bug where vehicle pathing costs were not properly calculated, resulting in zig zags when pathing behind the vehicle.
- Fixed bug where vehicle caravans would calculate incorrect movement ticks.
- Fixed duplicate float menu option bug for repair / paint. <title>Additional Changes</title><font>Small</font> - Modified chance of instant death when boat sinks over deep water
- Added Drowning hediff that applies to pawns in sinking ship (proportional to manipulation / movement capacities average)
- Added pawn rendering + icon for disembarking individual pawns from a vehicle
- Added VehicleTurret restriction mechanics, allowing for turret to be enabled or disabled only if certain conditions are met (eg. must be stationary to aim + shoot)
- Added Reactor mechanics to VehicleComponents. Reactors are event based mechanics that will trigger certain mechanics when a vehicle component takes damage. (eg. explode, leak fuel, etc.)
- Gizmos for unloading pawns inside the vehicle now render the pawn instead of a generic icon
- Painting a vehicle now requires a pawn to perform the paint job on the vehicle, rather than being instantaneous
- Vehicles can be given a deconstruct designator, breaking the vehicle apart into a fraction of its cost.
- Added basic information to vehicle info card
- Reworked job limitations to apply to prioritized jobs rather than just workgivers.
- Added vehicle stat parts that can be applied to specific vehicle defs and not just entire vehicle stat defs.
- Adjusted ModSettings UI for better float and integer box inputs. <title>Final Notes</title><font>Small</font> Please report any issues you find <link>https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicles/issues</link>(here.) or on the discord server.
